response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a valuable asset that has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than $12,000 to you. However, considering our business goals and the current market conditions, I'm willing to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $10,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its actual value and provides you with an excellent return on investment. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10000}
